actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose a minimum tax on certain foreign or foreign controlled corporations.
short_title: Fairness and Equity Tax Act of 1992

summary.text: Fairness and Equity Tax Act of 1992 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose an additional minimum tax on: (1) a domestic corporation which is 25 percent foreign-owned; or (2) a foreign corporation engaged in a trade or business within the United States.

titles.title: Fairness and Equity Tax Act of 1992
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose a minimum tax on certain foreign or foreign controlled corporations.
